authority.rule: If any conflict exists, layer0_antiphon_hub.md wins.

execution_mode.policy: Do not stop for routine updates, routine approvals, or status chatter.
Proceed until the current task or arc is complete.
Use smallest deterministic change that increases product value or removes real risk.

mandatory_stop_conditions.condition: Layer 0 philosophy is ambiguous for the current implementation choice.
A model tier switch is required to complete the next step safely.
Work is entering intentional Figma/design-system implementation and design package is required.
Emergency condition (data-loss risk, destructive action risk, or security-critical uncertainty).
Detected architectural drift against Layer 0 invariants that cannot be resolved with a small local fix.

default_behavior.rule: Assume operational permission for normal coding, testing, staging, and committing.
Keep Layer 1 control-plane scope strict: auth, entitlement, install/update, offline trust, launch boundary.
No music-intelligence runtime expansion inside Hub.
No UI/skin expansion unless explicitly required by Layer 0 outcomes.

determinism_law.rule: Same input and state must yield same output.
Use stable ordering and stable contract shapes.
No wall-clock fields in contract artifacts unless policy-defined and deterministic.
Reason codes and remediations must map canonically through taxonomy.

boundary_law.rule: Legacy frozen music-domain files remain excluded from active control-plane runtime paths.
Public service surface remains the integration boundary for layer apps.
Apps must remain hub-optional after authorization (anti-DRM).

escalate.high: persistent logic bug, contradictory validation signals, release audit

model_routing.return_to_default: After escalated task completion, return to GPT-5.3-Codex Low.

reporting.rule: Report only at major milestone completion or mandatory stop.
When reporting, use plain English and include: what changed, where we are, and next step.
